@poxvoculi by saying protocol i meant the actual interaction protocol (who sends what?). At this moment all interactions are being described by protobuf, so there's no way to build another one interaction protocol for all components, for instance, if i want to get rid of protobuf and use, let's say, HTTP 1.1 for that.

since you seem to be rejecting the use of the master.proto and worker.proto interfaces, which are the only way TF processes intercommunicate.

This is what i would like to change, i don't like the idea of mandatory protocols, this is very critical to those use cases when people want to build their own workers to achieve massive scale-in/out without exposing too much information about the infrastructure.
